description: Try your hand at this chocolate slice recipe. Salty pretzels mingle with sweet chocolate in this delectable party-worthy treat.
name: Caramel, Chocolate & Pretzel Crack Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Grease an 18 x 28cm slice pan. Line base and sides with baking paper, extending paper 3cm above edges on long sides.
Place crackers in a food processor and process until finely chopped.

Melt butter and sugar in a small saucepan over medium heat until smooth and combined. Add to processor and process until combined. Using back of a metal spoon, press mixture over base of pan to compact. Freeze until required. Clean and dry saucepan.
Place caramel in same small saucepan over high heat. Cook, stirring, for 3 minutes or until thick. Spread caramel over cracker layer. Freeze for 10 minutes or until set.
Spread chocolate over caramel layer. Scatter over pretzels. Refrigerate for 10 minutes or until set. Cut into rough shards to resemble bark. Serve.
